verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
This month <S%H2320><s%> shall be unto you the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of months <S%H2320><s%>: it shall be the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the year to you <S%H8141><s%>.

Speak <S%H1696><s%> you unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this month <S%H2320><s%> they shall take <S%H3947><s%> to them every man <S%H376><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%>, according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, a lamb <S%H7716><s%> for an house <S%H1004><s%>:

And if the household <S%H1004><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> too little <S%H4591><s%> for the lamb <S%H7716><s%>, let him and his neighbor <S%H7934><s%> next <S%H7138><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> it according to the number <S%H4373><s%> of the souls <S%H5315><s%>; every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating <S%H400><s%> shall make your count <S%H3699><s%> for the lamb <S%H7716><s%>.

Your lamb <S%H7716><s%> shall be outside blemish <S%H8549><s%>, a male <S%H2145><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>: you shall take <S%H3947><s%> it out from the sheep <S%H3532><s%>, or from the goats <S%H5795><s%>:

And you shall keep <S%H4931><s%> it up until the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same month <S%H2320><s%>: and the whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall kill <S%H7819><s%> it in <S%H996><s%> the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and strike <S%H5414><s%> it on the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts <S%H4201><s%> and on the upper door post <S%H4947><s%> of the houses <S%H1004><s%>, where they shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> in that night <S%H3915><s%>, roast <S%H6748><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>; and with bitter <S%H4844><s%> herbs they shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.

Eat <S%H398><s%> not of it raw <S%H4995><s%>, nor boiled <S%H1310><s%> at all with water <S%H4325><s%>, but roast <S%H6748><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; his head <S%H7218><s%> with his legs <S%H3767><s%>, and with the inner parts there <S%H7130><s%>.

And you shall let nothing of it remain <S%H3498><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and that which remains <S%H3498><s%> of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And thus <S%H3602><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H4975><s%>; with your waist belted <S%H2296><s%>, your shoes <S%H5275><s%> on your feet <S%H7272><s%>, and your staff <S%H4731><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%>; and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in hurry <S%H2649><s%>: it is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s passover <S%H6453><s%>.

For I will pass <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%>, and will strike <S%H5221><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, both man <S%H120><s%> and animal <S%H929><s%>; and against all the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H8201><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be to you for a token <S%H226><s%> upon the houses <S%H1004><s%> where you are <S%H7200><s%>: and when I see the blood <S%H1818><s%>, I will pass <S%H6452><s%> over you <S%H5063><s%>, and the plague shall not be upon you to destroy <S%H4889><s%> you <S%H5221><s%>, when I strike the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And this day <S%H3117><s%> shall be unto you for a memorial <S%H2146><s%>; and you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>; you shall keep it a feast <S%H2287><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>; even <S%H389><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall put away <S%H7673><s%> yeast <S%H7603><s%> out of your houses <S%H1004><s%>: for whoever eat <S%H398><s%> leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> until the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And in the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>, and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you <S%H4399><s%>; no manner of work shall be done <S%H6213><s%> in them <S%H389><s%>, save that which every man <S%H5315><s%> must eat <S%H398><s%>, that only may be done of you <S%H6213><s%>.

And you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> the feast of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>; for in this same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> have I brought <S%H3318><s%> your armies <S%H6635><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: therefore shall you observe <S%H8104><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H6240><s%>, on the fourteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>, until the one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall there be no yeast <S%H7603><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in your houses <S%H1004><s%>: for whoever eat <S%H398><s%> that which is leavened <S%H2556><s%>, even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whether he be a stranger <S%H1616><s%>, or born <S%H249><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.
You shall eat <S%H398><s%> nothing leavened <S%H2556><s%>; in all your habitations <S%H4186><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%>.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4900><s%>, Draw out and take <S%H3947><s%> you a lamb <S%H6629><s%> according to your families <S%H4940><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a bunch <S%H92><s%> of hyssop <S%H231><s%>, and dip <S%H2881><s%> it in the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is in the basin <S%H5592><s%>, and strike <S%H5060><s%> the lintel <S%H4947><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts <S%H4201><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is in the basin <S%H5592><s%>; and none <S%H376><s%> of you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will pass through <S%H5674><s%> to strike <S%H5062><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>; and when he sees <S%H7200><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the lintel <S%H4947><s%>, and on the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts <S%H4201><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will pass over <S%H6452><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%>, and will not allow <S%H5414><s%> the destroyer <S%H7843><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> in unto your houses <S%H1004><s%> to strike you <S%H5062><s%>.
And you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> for an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> to you and to your sons <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H935><s%>, when you be come to the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H1696><s%>, according as he has promised, that you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> this service <S%H5656><s%>.
And it shall come to pass <S%H1121><s%>, when your sons shall say <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H5656><s%>, What mean you by this service?

That you shall say <S%H559><s%>, It is the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s passover <S%H6453><s%>, who passed <S%H6452><s%> over the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, when he struck <S%H5062><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> our houses <S%H1004><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> bowed the head <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went away <S%H3212><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, so did they <S%H6213><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H2677><s%>, that at midnight the Lord <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that sat <S%H3427><s%> on his throne <S%H3678><s%> unto the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the captive <S%H7628><s%> that was in the dungeon <S%H1004><s%>; and all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of cattle <S%H929><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>, he <S%H5650><s%>, and all his servants, and all the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>; and there was a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; for there was not a house <S%H1004><s%> where there was not one dead <S%H4191><s%>.

And he called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Rise up <S%H6965><s%>, and get you forth <S%H3318><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, both you and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and go <S%H3212><s%>, serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, as you have said <S%H1696><s%>.
Also take <S%H3947><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and your herds <S%H1241><s%>, as you have said <S%H1696><s%>, and be gone <S%H3212><s%>; and bless me also <S%H1288><s%>.

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were urgent <S%H2388><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they might send <S%H7971><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> in hurry <S%H4116><s%>; for they said <S%H559><s%>, We be all dead men <S%H4191><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> their dough <S%H1217><s%> before it was leavened <S%H2556><s%>, their kneadingtroughs <S%H4863><s%> being bound up <S%H6887><s%> in their clothes <S%H8071><s%> upon their shoulders <S%H7926><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and they borrowed <S%H7592><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and clothes <S%H8071><s%>:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, so that they lent <S%H7592><s%> unto them such things as they required <S%H5337><s%>. And they spoiled the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H7486><s%> to Succoth <S%H5523><s%>, about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> on foot <S%H7273><s%> that were men <S%H1397><s%>, beside <S%H905><s%> sons <S%H2945><s%>.

And a mixed <S%H6154><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> also with them <S%H6629><s%>; and flocks, and herds <S%H1241><s%>, even very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H3515><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>.

And they baked <S%H644><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of the dough <S%H1217><s%> which they brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, for it was not leavened <S%H2556><s%>; because they were thrust out <S%H1644><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and could <S%H3201><s%> not stay <S%H4102><s%>, neither had they prepared <S%H6213><s%> for themselves any food <S%H6720><s%>.

Now the staying <S%H4186><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, was four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, even the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it came to pass <S%H6635><s%>, that all the hosts of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

It is a night <S%H3915><s%> to be much observed <S%H8107><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for bringing <S%H3318><s%> them out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: this is that night <S%H3915><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to be observed <S%H8107><s%> of all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, This is the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%>: There shall no stranger <S%H1121><s%> eat there <S%H398><s%>
But every man <S%H376><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%> that is bought <S%H4736><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>, when you have circumcised <S%H4135><s%> him <S%H398><s%>, then shall he eat there
A foreigner <S%H8453><s%> and an hired servant <S%H7916><s%> shall not eat there <S%H398><s%>

In one <S%H259><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall it be eaten <S%H398><s%>; you shall not carry forth <S%H3318><s%> anything of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%>; neither shall you break <S%H7665><s%> a bone there <S%H6106><s%>
All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep it <S%H6213><s%>.

And when a stranger <S%H1616><s%> shall stay <S%H1481><s%> with you and will keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, let all his males <S%H2145><s%> be circumcised <S%H4135><s%>, and then let him come near <S%H7126><s%> and keep <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H249><s%>; and he shall be as one that is born in the land <S%H776><s%>: for no uncircumcised person <S%H6189><s%> shall eat there <S%H398><s%>
One <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> shall be to him that is homeborn <S%H249><s%>, and unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that stays <S%H1481><s%> among you <S%H8432><s%>.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, so did they <S%H6213><s%>.

And it came to pass the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did bring <S%H3318><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by their armies <S%H6635><s%>.
